name: Deception (Noah GG)
description:
Deception. A game of multiple layers of simulations. A game where someone already played and left you gadgets that are useful.  A game that shouldnt be described as karlson u mfs.

try to find all easter eggs :D  (note: on level 4 there are 2)

DISCLAIMER: BOSS FIGHT NOT COMPLETE, THERE IS ONE BUT IT IS TERRIBLE

Some epic screenshots

HOW TO PLAY: WASD to move. SPACE to jump. Left Click to use the hammer. E to equip and interact. Right Click to use Real Glasses. Difficulties: Easy mode (baby mode) Hard mode (when u die u respawn at the first level, shorter time to use glasses) Hell mode( play if u want a broken monitor)
